headline: UBS Raises PT on Oracle Corporation (ORCL) to $280; Maintains ‘Buy’ Rating
summary: Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) is included in our list of the 12 Unstoppable Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks to Buy Right Now. On July 17, 2025, UBS raised its price target on Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) from $250 to $280, maintaining a ‘Buy’ rating. This price revision is driven by heightened AI-driven growth expectations. The analyst also sees […]

headline: Software-defined Wide Area Network (SD-WAN) Market worth $21.67 billion by 2030 | MarketsandMarkets™

headline: AI evolution prompts sense of urgency among CFOs: Oracle
summary: The steady evolution of AI is creating a sense of urgency for CFOs — but they need to ensure they have the right mix of tech and accounting skills inside of their teams, Oracle’s Hari Sankar says.

headline: Rimini Street, University of Melbourne Partner to Support Oracle Systems, Enhance Student Experience
